name: UltimateOscarsMovieTrivia
0:
”Alexa, start Ultimate Oscars movie trivia”
”Is it four?”
”The answer is two.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ultimate oscars movie trivia
des:
For the true Hollywood movie fan! 

Over 400 questions in Academy Award Oscar-winning movie history. Can you name the winner of best picture, best actor, best actress, best supporting actor, best supporting actress? Can you name them for every year going back to the start of the academy awards? 

The spotlight is on you and it's time to prove it! This is the ultimate movie trivia game for true fans of Hollywood and film history. Play it alone or play it with friends!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
